title: Foxworth Friday: Conference Championship Previews, Hackett to Denver
description:
Bomani Jones and Domonique Foxworth preview the NFC and AFC Championship games in the NFL playoffs. They get into whether or not the 49ers can overcome QB Jimmy Garoppolo's flaws to beat the Rams (1:19) and whether or not Bengals QB Joe Burrow can avoid contact long enough to lead an upset over the Chiefs (22:39). Plus, the Broncos hire Packers OC Nathaniel Hackett as their new coach (28:13). Nepotism or a quality hire?
